CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 21, 1953, pg. 26, reads: "Cage Beauties - Ammon Recreation Center is always assured of a large crowd when the Ammonettes basketball team takes to the court. Besides beauty the girls have enough basketball ability to make watching them a pleasure.  Left to right, front row, Beverly Masey, Joan Arnold, Shirley Skinner, Myra Harris, Daisy Younger, Arlene Charles and Henrietta Bloxson.  Back row: Beatrice Glenn, Barbara Harper, Margaret Tallinca, Ophelia Brown, Ammon basketball queen of 1953; Evelyn Moses, Dolores Watkins and Dorthy Watts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Team portrait of Amonettes women's basketball team, first row from left: Beverly Masey, Joan Arnold, Shirley Skinner, Myra Harris, Daisy Younger, Arlene Charles, and Henrietta Bloxson; back row: Beatrice Glenn, Barbara Harper, Margaret Tallinca, Ophelia Brown, Evelyn Moses, Dolores Watkins, and Dorthy Watts, posed in gymnasium
